title: Algebraic Topology I
description: Simplicial homology.  Chain complexes and acyclic carriers. Simplicial approximation.  The exact homology sequence. Maps of spheres. Mayer-Vietoris sequence.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 4107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 4431 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 6451 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
